description:
A girl tricks a monkey out of marriage. A woman devours the legs of an octopus. An oil seller is tricked by a fox.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saru no Muko-dono / Otojo no Hi / Abura Uri to Kitsune
The Monkey Groom / Otojo`s Fire / The Oil Seller and the Fox
猿の婿どの / オト女の火 / あぶら売りときつね
